Last thing from my notes: I‚Äôve been pleasantly surprised by the #Patriots‚Äô linebacker trio of Ja‚ÄôWhaun Bentley, Raekwon McMillan, and Mack Wilson. Bentley‚Äôs role may change slightly, while McMillan looks good in the middle and Wilson brings explosiveness in the passing game.

Bader is currently on the DL with plantar fasciitis. The Yankees have wanted better defense in CF and to get Judge out of CF to protect his legs
Yankees have sent Jordan Montgomery to the Cards for Harrison Bader

Pablo Lopez will remain with the Marlins beyond the Trade Deadline, per source. The Yankees were one of the teams that tried to deal for him, but the match wasn't there. Lopez is under club control through 2024.
Cardinals acquiring LHP Jordan Montgomery from the Yankees, sources tell me and @LindseyAdler. Return not yet known.

Standout @KyleBrandt has signed a multi-year deal with Peyton Manning‚Äôs Omaha Productions.

‚ÄúKyle Brandt‚Äôs Basement‚Äù premieres Monday 8/8 on ESPN digital platforms. @KBbasement

Brandt tested with Peyton and Eli for MNF, which led to the deal.

The Philadelphia Phillies are finalizing a deal to acquire right-hander Noah Syndergaard from the Los Angeles Angels, sources tell ESPN.
Broncos RB @DamareaCrockett also announced that he suffered a season-ending torn ACL at today's practice. So both Crockett and WR Tim Patrick done for the season.
Tim Patrick suffered a torn ACL Tuesday in Broncos' practice, per @mikeklis https://t.co/PbE2GQCFwW
The #Dolphins released DT Adam Butler with a failed physical designation.
Bills‚Äô All-Pro safety Jordan Poyer hyperextended his elbow today and will miss what one source described as ‚Äúa few weeks.‚Äù Poyer is expected to be back for the start of the regular season.
The New York Yankees today announced that they have acquired minor league right-handed pitcher Clayton Beeter from the Los Angeles Dodgers in exchange for outfielder Joey Gallo.

Headlines from Day 6 of Patriots training camp @985TheSportsHub https://t.co/5x33xAFJtP

The Deshaun Watson news did happen yesterday.

Don't let the NFL make you forget about it by dropping the #Dolphins bombshell story today.

Mac Jones on the offense:

"We have a lot of room to grow."
"We need to just kind of grow a little bit more here and pick up the pace a little bit."
"We're in the start of this thing and we've got to get it going."
"When you lose the day, to me, it's like a shot in the heart."
So if Tom Brady was a participant in this tampering scandal, where's his punishing? Did he get off scot-free?
Joint practices with Bucs and Dolphins in Tampa next week just got a little more awkward.
Mac makes it a happy birthday with a high-5. https://t.co/IRlP5Fx1B3
Mac Jones stops by a kiddo who turned 5 today. Autograph and a high five as a gift? Not bad! https://t.co/zNrrgEu5O7

NFL ruled that the Dolphins had "impermissible communications with quarterback Tom Brady in 2019-20, while he was under contract to the New England Patriots. Those communications began as early as August 2019 and continued throughout the 2019 season and postseason."
Mac Jones says the practices where the defense wins is ‚Äúlike a shot in the heart. ‚Ä¶ Better days ahead.‚Äù https://t.co/pW2mebrtme

The package going back to Washington for Juan Soto and Josh Bell, sources tell ESPN:

- LHP MacKenzie Gore
- OF Robert Hassell III
- SS C.J. Abrams
- OF James Wood
- RHP Jarlin Susana
- one more major league player

That's the only holdup right now to the agreed-upon deal.

BREAKING: The #Dolphins will forfeit a first-round selection in the 2023 NFL draft and third-round selection in the 2024 NFL Draft and owner Stephen Ross is suspended through October 17, 2022 after a league investigation.

The San Diego Padres are finalizing a deal to acquire superstar outfielder Juan Soto from Washington, sources tell ESPN. 

One of the biggest deals in baseball history goes down, and it sends the 23-year-old to SD, where he will team with Fernando Tatis Jr. and Manny Machado.
Tough end to Bills practice, with key S Jordan Poyer suffering a potentially serious arm injury. Was a First Team All Pro in 2021
Sources: #Padres and #Nationals have agreed in principle on a Juan Soto trade, with Josh Bell also going to San Diego. @MLB @MLBNetwork
Devin Asiasi is having the best camp since being drafted by the Patriots. Said he knew his hard work would start to show up. https://t.co/Gx8i8mZGO2
Sneaky riser early in camp: Arlington Hambright. He‚Äôs been good in pass rush drills and got some run with the starters at right guard this morning.

I had Mac Jones 8-for-8 in 7s and 6-for-11 in 11s, including a drop and a throwaway. 

Bailey Zappe was 8-for-13 in full-team 11s. Lot of work for the rookie again today with Brian Hoyer still out (23 11-on-11 reps to Jones' 17).

Mac Jones went 6/11 in 11v11s and 8/8 in 7v7s. On his incompletions, there was a drop, two plays blown up by the rush, a deflection and probably DPI.

Bailey Zappe went 9/12 in 11v11s and 5/7 in 7v7s.

The backup offense had more success today in full-team periods.

Glass half full: Defense looks good. 

Glass half empty: Offense doesn‚Äôt really. 

There‚Äôs no glass it‚Äôs 11 AM on a Tuesday: It‚Äôs only the 2nd real practice of camp.
Mack Wilson just put a HIT on J.J. Taylor in the red zone in 11-on-11s. There was a decent-sized hole for Taylor, but Wilson hit it harder and bowled over Taylor.
No. It‚Äôs Tyquan Thornton Tuesday and you‚Äôre missing it. Seriously. https://t.co/J94Zyes2SX
Ronnie Perkins has had one of the best practices I‚Äôve seen from him. He had a sack, a couple run stuffs and has been in the backfield plenty today

The @Patriots need to STRETCH THE FIELD MORE, so they got 2 big speedy targets by drafting Tyquan Thornton and trading for DeVante Parker. Adding their big play potential and featuring UNDERRATED Kendrick Bourne is key in improving Mac Jones‚Äô 19th rank in yards per completion.
Barmore just steamrolled Yasir Durant in 11-on-11s, then blew up an inside handoff to Ty Montgomery on the next play. Big day for him. https://t.co/tOt2mVdGRl

Mac Jones & the starters in 11s:

- Throwaway
- Sack
- PBU
- Completion
- Completion
- Sack
#Bears practice has kicked and it appears Teven Jenkins will miss a 5th consecutive practice.

For those updating Patriots rosters at home (or at practice today), please add the following defensive backs, both of whom worked out for the team Monday:

üèà35: Brad Hawkins (Michigan)
üèà36: Jalen Elliott (Notre Dame)
Nelson Agholor with another nice catch. He hauled in a 40-yard deep ball from Mac Jones with Bethel in coverage.
Trent Brown looks like he's barely trying and can just chuck guys. Henry Anderson was the latest victim in a 1-on-1 drill.
To cap off an ugly stretch for 11-on-11s, Harvey Langi stuffed the ball instantly in the backfield on a Damien Harris carry. The ball had barely left Bailey Zappe's hands on the handoff.
Patriots' offense is looking rough today. Lot of run stuffs and a disjointed play-action game. Mac Jones' first two dropbacks in the latest round of 11-on-11s resulted in a throwaway and a sack.

And the installation is going ... slowly.

Today's opening 11-on-11 period, starters vs. starters:
- 2-yard gain
- Throwaway
- Run stuff
- 2-yard gain
- Sack https://t.co/J1XziDxrPs

Through almost 7 practices, the new #Patriots offense seems to borrow more specifically from Sean McVay than general Shanahan principles.

- Heavy outside zone
- Play-action boot passes off the outside zone
- Tight wide receiver splits
- Increasing amounts of jet motion
Tyquan Thornton just took a handoff on an end-around. Think that's the first time we've seen that from him
Here‚Äôs Tyquan Thornton‚Äôs over the shoulder catch against Jalen Mills https://t.co/OgFjDEn5G9

Malcolm Butler (vs. Bourne) and Terrance Mitchell (vs. Agholor) had PBUs in 1-on-1s. Mitchell's came on a deep ball that was slightly underthrown. 

Jalen Mills and Marcus Jones had reps that likely would have been flagged for holding.

Two former Patriots ‚Äî @Teddyjradio and Lonie Paxton ‚Äî catch up during today‚Äôs practice. 

Snow angels for everyone. https://t.co/sJ5XvZvEOE

Tyquan Thornton made an impossible over shoulder catch down right side on a throw from Mac Jones in 1-on-1s. Ball coming in with minimal arc directly over helmet and Thornton contorted and leaned back to have it fall in bucket while going down. Arrow pointing up
Jalen Mills continues to impress me. He beat DeVante Parker and Kendrick Bourne in 1v1s today and both WRs have been tough to handle in camp.

@TheAtlantic Deion Jones recorded 11 INTs and 44 passes defended in 6 seasons. Showing signs of elite coverage skills for a LB early in his career.

He's 27-years old and currently rehabbing an injury but might be the next De'Vondre Campbell/Demario Davis rejuvenated type player on a new team

1-on-1 pass rush highlights:
- Trent Brown 2-0 in matchups vs. Matt Judon, Josh Uche. He's 4-0 so far. 
- Uche sent Isaiah Wynn to the ground with a spin move.
- Christian Barmore failed to overpower David Andrews, then went around Mike Onwenu.

In a 1-on-1, Nelson Agholor made an absolute CIRCUS catch with one hand. CB Joejuan Williams held up Agholor's left hand with contact, so the WR palmed the ball with his left hand and shoved Williams on the ground. Agholor waltzed into the end zone.

Heck of an over-the-shoulder catch by Tyquan Thornton, who beat tight coverage by Jalen Mills. 

Mills stopped and clapped for the rookie afterward.
Josh Uche just tossed Isaiah Wynn in a 1-on-1 pass rush drill.
Ty Montgomery just made a great juggling catch with Jonathan Jones all over him. Continues to make plays
Both of the Patriots‚Äô new DBs are running with the safeties. https://t.co/Jvh4Vh4Vtx
Here‚Äôs Tyquan Thornton leading off position drills today. https://t.co/DkowJb711g

The #Falcons have been actively trying to trade Pro-Bowl LB Deion Jones, according to the @TheAtlantic 

Teams around the NFL aren't showing enough interest in Jones, who has declined in recent seasons after a very promising start to his career. ATL don't plan on cutting him yet. https://t.co/3oShfTsp9J

QB Brian Hoyer is not present for the fourth straight practice, but coach Bill Belichick said earlier this morning he expects Hoyer back soon. 

More reps for rookie Bailey Zappe behind Mac Jones.
